WelcomeToHtml:
Welcome to RomeoHR

Hello $fullName$

 

From one HR leader to another, I warmly welcome you to RomeoHR. Our company mission is to set people free to do great work and everything we produce is designed to do just that.

 

By now, you may have received a call from us to schedule a personalized demo, else if not we are looking forward to getting in touch with you soon. We are excited to discover how we can be great together. 

Your RomeoHR Account

$username$

Log In

Best regards,
RomeoHR Team

selfAccessGranted:
Self Access Granted to $companyName$ Account

Dear $userName$,
We are pleased to inform you that you now have self-access to your $companyName$ account. This access allows you to explore and utilize the platforms features independently.
To get started, please follow these steps:
1. Log in: Use your existing credentials to log in at https://app.romeohr.com.
2. Explore Features: Once logged in, you can access all available resources tailored to help you meet your goals.
3. Need Assistance? Our support team is available should you have any questions. Dont hesitate to reach out to contact@romeohr.com.
Please feel free to explore, and let us know if you need any help along the way. We hope you have a productive experience with your $companyName$ account!

Best Regards,
RomeoHR Team

81-83 Campbell Street, SURRY HILLS, NSW 2010, Australia

roleAdded:
$userType$ Role for $clientCompanyName$

Dear $consultantName$,
We wanted to inform you that you have been added to $clientCompanyName$ as a $userType$. This role enables you to continue providing your valuable expertise and support, and were pleased to have you onboard.
If you need any additional resources or have questions regarding your assignment, please feel free to reach out to us. Were here to ensure you have the support you need to deliver exceptional service.
For any issues or concerns related to your assignment with $clientCompanyName$, please contact their representative directly at $companyEmail$.
However, if you encounter any issues with RomeoHR or need assistance from our team, feel free to email us at contact@romeohr.com.
Thank you once again for your commitment and collaboration.

Best Regards,
RomeoHR Team

81-83 Campbell Street, SURRY HILLS, NSW 2010, Australia

roleDeactivated:
$userType$ Account Deactivation for $clientCompanyName$

Dear $consultantName$,
We are reaching out to inform you that your $userType$ account for $clientCompanyName$ has been deactivated. This action was requested by $clientCompanyName$, and as a result, your access to their resources and assignments has been temporarily discontinued.
Please note that your account may be reactivated in the future if requested by $clientCompanyName$.
For any questions or concerns regarding this action, or if you wish to discuss reactivation, we recommend contacting $clientCompanyName$ directly at $companyEmail$.
For any additional support or questions related to your general account with RomeoHR, please feel free to reach out to us at contact@romeohr.com.
Thank you for your understanding, and we appreciate your contributions as part of our consultant network.

Best Regards,
RomeoHR Team

81-83 Campbell Street, SURRY HILLS, NSW 2010, Australia
